devdoc.details: This contract manages health records with role-based access control for Patients and Doctors. It links a user to their health data stored on IPFS.

addDoctor(address).details: Adds a new doctor to the system. Can only be called by the owner.

params._doctorAddress: The wallet address of the doctor to add.

addRecord(string,string).details: Adds a new health record. Can only be called by a patient.

params._fileName: The name of the file for easy identification.
params._ipfsCid: The IPFS Content ID for the data file.

getMyRecordIds().details: Retrieves all record IDs associated with the calling patient.

returns._0: A dynamic array of uints representing the record IDs.

getRecordById(uint256).details: Retrieves the details of a specific record. Access is restricted to the patient owner or an authorized doctor.

params._recordId: The ID of the record to retrieve.

grantAccess(uint256,address).details: Grants a doctor access to one of the patient's records.

params._doctorAddress: The address of the doctor being granted access.
params._recordId: The ID of the record to grant access to.

removeDoctor(address).details: Removes a doctor from the system. Can only be called by the owner.

params._doctorAddress: The wallet address of the doctor to remove.

revokeAccess(uint256,address).details: Revokes a doctor's access to one of the patient's records.

params._doctorAddress: The address of the doctor whose access is being revoked.
params._recordId: The ID of the record to revoke access from.

devdoc.title: HealthRecord
